fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.http

Interface IContentType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IMediaType

    public interface IContentType
extends IMediaType
    Represents a HTTP content type, based on a media type with an optional charset.

    Only text/* or application/* media types may have a charset associated.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be immutable and therefore completely thread-safe.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.fs.IMediaType

        ANY, TYPE_APPLICATION, TYPE_AUDIO, TYPE_IMAGE, TYPE_MULTIPART, TYPE_TEXT, TYPE_VIDEO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Charset getCharset()
      Gets the associated charset for this media type, if defined.
      boolean hasCharset()
      Determines whether this content type has an associated charset.

      • Methods inherited from interface fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.fs.IMediaType

        getSubtype, getType, isAnySubtype, isAnyType, isApplication, isImage, isText, toString, toString

    • Method Detail

      • hasCharset

        boolean hasCharset()
        Determines whether this content type has an associated charset.

        Only text/* or application/* media types may have a charset associated.

        Returns:
        true if the charset is not null.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getCharset

        Charset getCharset()
        Gets the associated charset for this media type, if defined.

        Only text/* or application/* media types may have a charset associated.

        Returns:
        the charset, if defined, or null.
        Since:
        1.0
